title: Add New Anonymity Pools for CYC, USDT, BUSD_b, ZOOM and MCN
body:
# Background

Cyclone is the leading #PriFi protocol that offers cross-chain + zkSNARKs-based privacy, with yield enhancement, governed by the decentralized DAO. Cyclone has been successfully launched on IoTeX, BSC, Ethereum and Polygon.

# Proposal

The proposal suggests adding five new anonymity pools in Cyclone Protocol on IoTeX mainnet at block height [13793514](https://iotexscout.io/block/13793514) (Oct. 18th 5AM UTC), they are CYC, BUSD, ioUSDT, ZOOM and MCN. The token economy is the same as https://docs.cyclone.xyz/cyc-token/anonymity-mining-v2 .

## New Pools

### IoTeX - Pool Macaron

Asset: 3 CYC

Life Cycle: 90 days

Anonymity Mining v2: 2 CYC per day

Coin Denomination: 100 IOTX

Anonymity Fee: 0.02 CYC

Relayer Fee: 1 IOTX

### IoTeX - Pool BUSD

Asset: 2,500 BUSD

Life Cycle: 90 days

Anonymity Mining v2: 0.25 CYC per day

Coin Denomination: 100 IOTX

Anonymity Fee: 0.02 CYC

Relayer Fee: 1 IOTX

### IoTeX - Pool ioUSDT

Asset: 2,500 ioUSDT

Life Cycle: 90 days

Anonymity Mining v2: 0.25 CYC per day

Coin Denomination: 100 IOTX

Anonymity Fee: 0.02 CYC

Relayer Fee: 1 IOTX

### IoTeX - Pool ZOOM

Asset: 20,000 ZOOM

Life Cycle: 90 days

Anonymity Mining v2: 0.5 CYC per day

Coin Denomination: 100 IOTX

Anonymity Fee: 0.02 CYC

Relayer Fee: 1 IOTX

### IoTeX - Pool MCN

Asset: 10 MCN

Life Cycle: 90 days

Anonymity Mining v2: 0.05 CYC per day

Coin Denomination: 100 IOTX

Anonymity Fee: 0.02 CYC

Relayer Fee: 1 IOTX

`Token Denomination` refers to the number of CYC tokens to deposit, which can be withdrawn later to a new address; `Coin Denomination` refers to the number of coins ($IOTX on IoTeX blockchain) to deposit, which can be withdrawn later to a new address, and to cover the future gas cost on this new address.

# The Vote

This proposal needs to be approved via a vote by the community before execution.

# Discussion

Please discuss this proposal in this forum thread: https://forum.cyclone.xyz/t/add-new-anonymity-pools-for-cyc-usdt-busd-b-zoom-and-mcn/149
author: 0x4891f20A4C681DE9aB75AF9523e2f070A26f9a20
